meanings.sent1: My mom is a grownup who takes care of me.
meanings.sent2: As a grownup, you can make your own decisions.
meanings.sent3: The grownup at the store gave me a lollipop for being good.
meanings.sent4: In the meeting, the grownup of the group shared their ideas.
meanings.sent5: The grownup in the room always knows what to do in a crisis.

meanings.definition: To have reached maturity or full development
meanings.sent1: I will grow up to be a grownup like my parents.
meanings.sent2: Plants need time to grow up and become fully grownup.
meanings.sent3: The caterpillar will grow up and transform into a grownup butterfly.
meanings.sent4: After years of hard work, the project will finally grow up and be a grownup success.
meanings.sent5: The small town will grow up and become a grownup city one day.
